pr_title: Remove the usage of Youtube attachment/tool for three auto-tests

timeline.message: Update MaxAttachmentsTest and its testing Collection
Update ItemUnlock Test and its testing Collection
Update ViewerTest and its testing Item

timeline.bodyText:
Nit: That's the wrong icon, shouldn't we:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  <thumbnail>https://www.edu-apps.org/assets/lti_public_resources/youtube_icon.png</thumbnail>
          
          
            
                  <thumbnail>https://www.edu-apps.org/assets/lti_public_resources/vimeo_icon.png</thumbnail>
